name: leggings
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
very tight trousers made from a material that stretches easily, sometimes worn under other clothes: She was wearing a blue fleece and black leggings. I like wearing leggings under dresses.
Olga Gillmeister/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
trousers made of a thick or strong material in order to protect the legs, sometimes worn over other trousers: He was wearing goatskin leggings, a bearskin hat, and a long cape. He had taken off his leggings and was unlacing his heavy boots.
More examplesFewer examplesI bought a pair of stripey leggings.You can make outfits less provocative by wearing leggings under skimpy skirts or T-shirts underneath revealing tops.The soldier wore chainmail over brown woollen leggings and tunic.
